title: Gatsby French
description: Kick off your next, great Gatsby project with this default-starter-intl. This barebones starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need.

home.headingh1: Wordpress Ecommerce et tous les plus grand systeme de blog, plateforme de publication et CMS ici à Phuket en Thaïlande
home.headingh2: Nous accompagnons nos clients dans la création de sites internet. Nous sommes l'Agence Web Phuket CMS
home.headingh3: Etude, UX, conception, design, développement, référencement. Notre agence web est en mesure de répondre à tous vos besoins et de développer ensemble une véritable stratégie digitale.
home.headingh3_2: Nous avons obtenu des récompenses pour notre savoir-faire UX, technique et créatif
home.s2link_3: de démonstration sur les derniere technologie Seo et Headless CMS
home.s2headingli2: Intégration et développement: Magento, Symfony, Prestashop, Woo-Commerce, Drupal, Typo3 ...
home.s2headingli5: Gestion de la boutique en ligne
home.s2headingli6: Gestion quotidienne de votre e-boutique et suivi des ventes.
home.s2headingli8: Gestion de la relation client (service après-vente).
home.s2headingli12: Marketing de recherche: SEA / SEO / Shopping
home.s2headingli13: Publicités sociales: publicités Facebook, publicités Instagram, publicités Pinterest…
home.s2headingli14: Campagnes Emailing et optimisation de votre @.
home.s2headingli15: Diffusion et gestion de votre catalogue sur les Marketplaces
home.s2headingli19: Logistique: partenaires, process, connecteur et module de synchronisation de flux.
home.s2headingli20: SEO: audit et recommandations (techniques, cocon sémantique, etc.)
home.s2headingli21: Création de contenu (via nos partenaires photo & vidéo).
home.s2headingli22: Photos et vidéos: recommandations, briefs, adaptation de contenus existants pour vos actions marketing.
home.s2headingli23: Systèmes d'information et ERP: intégration, développement de connecteurs adaptés, recommandations Flow et Process
home.s3headingh2: Timeline of your website building & optimization
home.s4headingh4: Find the website frameworks that fits your needs
home.s4headingp: There are too many possibility wordpress, prestashop, custom development platforms available in the markets. We find for you the best easy to use platforms, framework. Some of the tools are expensive while others are affordable. So, let’s list some of the best tools and their features for your online store development.
home.s4headingh4_2: With Search engine optimization in mind
home.s4headingp_1: With the scope well-defined, we can start digging into the sitemap, defining how the content and features we defined in scope definition will interrelate.
home.s4headingh4_3: Writting content, picture, video , competitive research & strategic research
home.s4headingp_2: Now that we have a bigger picture of the site in mind, we can start creating content for the individual pages, always keeping search engine optimization (SEO) in mind to help keep pages focused on a single topic. It's vital that you have real content to work with for our next stage:
home.s4headingh4_4: Find or create the best content for your needs
home.s4headingp_4: With the site architecture and some content in place, we can start working on the visual brand. We call it the first  painting. All our website are build with code optimization in mind
home.s4headingp_5: we analyze your code on a test server, this allows us to optimize your site to the maximum. this is what allows us to have incomparable performance. Our partners have extensive knowledge of servers and continuous integration.
home.s4headingp_6: Let’s propel yourself to the first places of google thanks to the keywords that we have defined together.

notfound.description: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
